properties.name: Pipeline
properties.message: One of the most famous surf spots in the world, known for its powerful waves.

properties.name: Jeffreys Bay
properties.message: Renowned for its long, fast barrels and consistent waves.

properties.name: Teahupo'o
properties.message: Famous for its heavy, glassy waves and challenging conditions.

properties.name: Mavericks
properties.message: Known for its massive waves, attracting big wave surfers from around the globe.

properties.name: Gold Coast
properties.message: Offers a variety of world-class breaks, including Snapper Rocks and Kirra.
